concept.title: 5344.202-2 Considerations

conbody.p: (a) For SMC, when the contract is a space program contract (See AFFARS 5302 ), and the contractor has submitted a written request for consent to subcontract with a contractor on the CRWL, follow the procedures at MP5309.190 .
